ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors thank all the patients and controls involved in this study. This research was supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (no. 81471300), the Sichuan Province Applied Basic Research Program (no. 2014JY0247), the Sichuan Key Project of Science and Technology (no. 2010SZ0086), and the Ministry of Science and Technology of China (2012AA02A514).
